experiences.bullets: Designing and Developing Machine Learning and Deep Learning Systems, with a proven track record in implementing appropriate ML algorithms to the production level., Developed UI prototypes and design documentation and developed it into Viable Product., Designing and Developing Fullstack and Mobile App various backend and frontend frameworks. ,Successfully created 2 Minimum Viable Product along with their Intellectual Property Rights. ,Presenting the innovation and creativity of the Products into the International and National scientific conferences as an oralist., Demonstrated expertise in running Machine Learning tests and experiments optimizing systems to achieve up to 93% accuracy., Conducted System Usability Scale (SUS) testing on an application receiving positive feedback from respondents (medical students and otorhinolaryngologists)

Designing and Developing Fullstack Web Application using various backend and frontend frameworks, Nurtured by collaborative Governmental teamwork that embracing assertive communication and analytical skills, Thoroughly understanding governmental need through desk research and interviews including a comprehensive competitive analysis to identify strengths and weaknesses of the client, Develop and manage a customer database including police number transaction number active date and customer's balance., Maintain and improve the Vehicle Rent and Maintenance System, ensuring smooth operations and user-friendly interfaces
